titleStmt.title: Methods to prevent smuggling in Great Britain
titleStmt.author: Merry Anthony, 1756-1835.

notesStmt.note: Lpro copy preceded by a letter relating to smuggling regulations dated 14 Feb. 1784 and signed by Anthony Merry. In this letter Merry mentions a plan he drew up in 1779.
Wing catalog date (168?) appears to be incorrect.
Reproduction of original in the Columbia University Library.
